title: E-car sales fall for the 6th straight month in September, e-2Ws continue on growth path
description: Electric car sales in India dropped for the sixth consecutive month in September by 7.76%, mainly because of Tata Motors. Meanwhile, e-two wheelers saw a 40.45% growth driven by manufacturers like Ola Electric and Bajaj Auto, increasing their market share significantly despite reduced government subsidies and ongoing challenges.
